attributes.action: veto any attempt to bestow any form of Honour on Mr.Tony Blair.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair has presided over this countries worst embarrassment to the Honours system for many decades. We have become the continuing sniggering joke between world leaders at any Summit or conference.
The prime minister is urged not to create an even worse national and international outcry by refusing to endorse any attempt to bestow any of the traditional honours normally given to an outgoing Prime Minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
